title: Resize Window. Cannot Do It
content:
Version 92.0 (64 bit) Ubuntu: 18.04, 20.04

For a couple of months, I have not been able to resize the FF window. Consequently, I abandoned FF for Chrome. I've just upgraded my os to Ubuntu 20.04 (from 18.04) so I thought I'd try FF again. The problem persists.

Minimize/Maximize work fine, but when non-maximized, the resize "handles" don't show up (see attached image). I've tried safe-mode, as suggested by some previous post, but it hasn't helped.

title: Sharing a link via Gmail
content: Firefox used to have an 'email link' menu option, which would open the email program defined in the Firefox preferences. In my case Gmail. This option has been replaced by the 'Share' menu options, where choosing 'Mail' opens Apple's mail program, not the Gmail which is my preferred e-mail client. I'm using MacOS 11.6. The 'Share' menu options are Apple system extensions and I can't see a way to add Gmail to those. Does anybody have a solution?

title: problem z wyświetlaniem stron internetowych
content:
Witam,

Od wielu miesięcy jest problem z poprawnym wyświetlaniem różnych stron przez przeglądarkę firefox. Ten problem nie występuje w żadnej innej przeglądarce: Chrome, Edge czy Opera. Najczęściej widzę to na bardzo popularnej stronie Tłumacz Google, bo używam często i jest to irytujące. Przeglądarka nie wyświetla obrazków (ikon) np. zmień język (wyświetla tekst swap_horiz) oraz wiele innych obrazków zapisanych w kodzie stron - problem widoczny na zrzucie ekranu w załączeniu. Po każdej aktualizacji Firefox problem nadal nie został rozwiązany, dlatego proszę o pomoc. Zaznaczę, że czyściłem wielokrotnie ciasteczka dla witryny google i chyba kilka raz czy dwa coś to pomogło na chwilę ale później np. po ponownym włączeniu przeglądarki problem znów był ten sam.

Pozdrawiam, Krzysiek

title: Unable to change page roles in Facebook with Firefox
content:
In Facebook, there is a capability for a page administrator to add someone with a role such as editor, admin, etc. I can do that and also change a role using Chrome, Opera, and Edge but in Firefox, the functions to add a user or edit an existing use functions aren't available. I've done a reset and made sure I have the latest version but keep getting the same thing. To reproduce the issue, you can create a new FB user and create a new page "owned" by that user. If you succeed in adding a user, you cannot subsequently change their role.

I've also verified that Javascript is enabled.

Thanks in advance for any suggestions on where to look or what to try. In the meantime, I have to use a browser other than Firefox.
creator: barry77

title: Help with browser crashes
content:
So, I started following instructions via this link: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-firefox-crashes-closing-or-quitting

I first made sure Firefox and all my drivers were up to date, which they were. Moving on, using Troubleshooting Mode, I have yet to encounter any issues. The screenshot below shows the crash reports between yesterday and today. For some reason it won't let me submit the crash report from yesterday, as well as the first one that happened today. I'm also not sure why there are 4 crash reports generated for 10:05PM on 9/30, because Firefox only crashed once to my knowledge.

Here's the submitted crash report ID's, though: bp-35800b96-f14a-488f-b94d-94fa10211001 bp-ad3476ee-2ceb-4de1-a824-a49a90211001 bp-94812bc3-6e24-4454-a479-a6fc70211001 bp-a238a0fc-37f9-4b5c-b883-eb2cb0211001

And the "Failed" Unsubmitted crash reports: b8ab5181-c940-4177-ad4b-00ef7b99f84a be5771aa-ccc2-423b-b94e-5acbd65ec765

Typically I have these extensions installed, and I've never had an issue thus far: 1. uBlock Origin (also in incognito) 2. Adguard Adblocker (also in incognito) 3. Honey 4. Translate Web Pages (though it's left disabled, unless needed)

Why do I use two adblockers? Because one or the other isn't typically sufficient, and I find those two to work together the best.

Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!
creator: nmarryat

title: Data missing on all web pages since last update
content:
Since I last updated a few days ago, information is missing on every web page I open. Some basic info comes up, but then it stops.

Two pages from the same site attached. In Chrome, everything loads in a few seconds.

In Firefox, info is still missing after five minutes or more. The same thing happens on every website; primary info only and "secondary" items don't load. Photos show, but captions are blank. A third file attached to show that.

I thought about deleting Firefox and starting from scratch, so I tried to both export and backup my thousands of bookmarks, but apparently whatever is wrong won't let me do either.

I've saved bookmarks before to transfer to a new computer several times, but I can't do it now.

Thanks for any help.

Dan Prall

title: Since recent Firefox browser update, consistently get error message: Secure Connection Failed  An error occurred during a connection to ----.com. PR_END_OF_FILE_ERROR ...

I use Avast antivirus software if that's useful info. thanks.
